title: To Zeus
lines: Much-honored Zeus, great god, indestructible Zeus, we lay before you in prayer redeeming testimony.
O king, you have brought to light divine works, earth, goddess and mother, the hills swept by the shrill winds, the sea and the host of the stars, marshaled by the sky.

Kronian Zeus, strong-spirited god, the thunderbolt is your scepter, father of all, beginning and end of all, earth-shaker, increaser and purifier, all-shaker, god of thunder and lightning, Zeus the sower.
Hear me, god of many faces, grant me unblemished health, please grant me divine peace and riches, please grant me glory without blame.
